item.title: 中国吉利汽车计划到2030年实现全球销量突破650万辆
item.description: 中国吉利控股集团周四表示，计划到2030年实现全球销量突破650万辆，届时其年收入预计将超过1万亿元人民币（合1436.2亿美元）。【原文：China's Geely Holding Group (GEELY.UL) said on Thursday that it targets global sales of over 6.5 million vehicles by 2030 when its annual revenue is estimated to top 1 trillion yuan ($143.62 billion).】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，阿里巴巴计划为旗下人工智能芯片制造子公司T-Head筹备首次公开募股（IPO）。
item.description: 据彭博社周四报道，阿里巴巴正准备将其芯片制造部门T-Head上市，消息人士透露了这一情况。【原文：Alibaba is preparing to list its chipmaking arm, T-Head, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 育碧股价暴跌，《刺客信条》制作方宣布重组并取消多款游戏
item.description: 育碧股价周四暴跌，此前这家法国电子游戏发行商宣布进行全面重组，并表示将取消六款游戏项目。【原文：Shares in Ubisoft plunged on Thursday after the French video game publisher announced a sweeping reorganisation and said it would cancel six games.】

item.title: 马斯克将于周四在达沃斯发表演讲
item.description: 根据世界经济论坛更新的日程安排，特斯拉首席执行官埃隆·马斯克将于当地时间周四下午4点30分（格林尼治时间15:30）在达沃斯论坛参与一场专题讨论会，与会者还包括贝莱德首席执行官拉里·芬克。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk will take part in a panel at Davos at 4:30 p.m. local time (1530 GMT) on Thursday with Blackrock CEO Larry Fink, according to the schedule updated by the World Economic Forum.】

item.title: 日本维持谨慎经济展望，警示美国贸易政策风险
item.description: 日本政府在周四发布的经济报告中，基本维持了对经济的谨慎乐观态度，同时警告美国贸易政策可能带来的下行风险。【原文：The Japanese government largely retained its cautiously optimistic view of the economy in its economic report published on Thursday, while warning of downside risks from U.S. trade policies.】

item.title: 解读：日本有哪些政策选项来平息债券抛售潮？
item.description: 日本政府债券（JGBs）的剧烈波动令投资者感到不安，这种资产类别长期以来一直被视为稳定的价值储藏手段。【原文：Wild swings in Japanese government bonds (JGBs) are unsettling for investors in an asset class that has long been regarded as a stable store of value.】

item.title: 英国AJ Bell报告显示平台板块季度总流入量增长27.7%
item.description: 投资平台AJ Bell报告称，其平台业务第一季度总资金流入量增长27.7%，但表示11月英国预算案公布前的不确定性促使更多客户从养老金账户中提取资金。【原文：Investment platform AJ Bell reported a 27.7% rise in first quarter gross inflows for its platform business but said that uncertainty in the run up to UK budget in November prompted more customers to pull money from their pensions.】

item.title: CityFibre表示，在其覆盖区域内，70%的宽带转换用户选择加入其网络。
item.description: CityFibre表示，在该公司网络覆盖范围内更换宽带供应商的家庭中，近70%在近几个月已转用其服务。由于天空电视台通过其光纤网络提供业内最快的网速，推动了用户接入量的增长。【原文：CityFibre said around 70% of the households that changed broadband supplier where its network was available had switched to its services in recent months, with take-up boosted by Sky offering some of the fastest speeds available via its fibre.】

item.title: 现代汽车韩国工会警告人形机器人计划，认为将威胁就业岗位
item.description: 韩国现代汽车工会周四警告该公司，未经工会批准不得部署人形机器人，称这些机器人将引发"就业冲击"。【原文：Hyundai Motor's labour union in South Korea warned the automaker on Thursday against deploying humanoid robots without union approval, saying the robots would bring "employment shocks."】

item.title: 益普索将在五年内投入12亿欧元用于人工智能和收购
item.description: 法国市场研究公司益普索首席执行官让-洛朗·普瓦图在接受采访时表示，该公司计划在五年内投入12亿欧元（约合14亿美元）用于人工智能研发和企业并购，以期扭转增长乏力的局面。【原文：French market research firm Ipsos plans to invest 1.2 billion euros ($1.4 billion) over five years in artificial intelligence and acquisitions as it seeks to reverse sluggish growth, its CEO Jean-Laurent Poitou said in an interview.】

item.title: 挪威电信以39亿美元出售泰国True集团股份
item.description: 挪威电信巨头挪威电信公司周四宣布，已同意以总计约390亿挪威克朗（合39.2亿美元）的价格出售其在泰国True集团的股份。【原文：Norway's Telenor said on Thursday it had agreed to sell its stake in Thailand's True Corporation for a total value of about 39 billion Norwegian crowns ($3.92 billion).】

item.title: 疫苗制造商感到寒意袭来，美国卫生部长肯尼迪的言论正成为现实
item.description: 投资者和高管表示，在卫生部长小罗伯特·肯尼迪领导下，美国政策的大幅调整正令疫苗制造商感到寒意。随着反疫苗言论转化为接种时间表和建议的具体调整，疫苗行业正面临严峻挑战。【原文：Sweeping U.S. policy changes under Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. are having a chilling effect on vaccine makers as anti-vaccine rhetoric has turned into concrete changes to inoculation schedules and recommendations, investors and executives said.】

item.title: 美国最高法院认为特朗普对美联储的肆意妄为存在风险
item.description: 在就特朗普总统解雇美联储理事丽莎·库克的请求进行辩论时，美国最高法院大法官们似乎认同这样一种观点：必须维护央行制定货币政策的独立性，削弱这种独立性将带来现实的经济风险。【原文：U.S. Supreme Court justices during arguments over President Donald Trump's bid to fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook seemed to embrace the idea that the central bank's independence to set monetary policy must be preserved and that eroding it would present real-world economic risks.】

item.title: 亚航X计划在合并航空公司后进行高达6亿美元的债务重组
item.description: 马来西亚亚航X公司副首席执行官法鲁克·卡马尔表示，这家廉价航空公司本周收购了Capital A的短途航空业务后，计划进行5亿至6亿美元的债务重组。【原文：Malaysia's AirAsia X targets $500 million to $600 million in debt restructuring after the budget airline this week bought the short-haul aviation business of Capital A , Deputy Group CEO Farouk Kamal said.】

item.title: 早盘竞价：股市将迎来"塔可星期四"行情
item.description: 汤姆·韦斯特布鲁克带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 中国农村银行减价力度虽大，仍难售出查封房产
item.description: 尽管大幅降价，中国农村银行拍卖的数百处法拍房仍无人问津，这加剧了房地产危机，并给金融业和整体经济带来更多风险。【原文：Chinese rural banks are unable to find buyers for hundreds of foreclosed properties they are auctioning despite offering steep discounts, deepening a real estate crisis and adding to risks for the financial sector and the broader economy.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构因涉嫌合规违规问题，下令对金融科技公司Airwallex展开审计。
item.description: 澳大利亚金融犯罪监管机构周四表示，已下令对支付平台Airwallex Pty进行审计，因其涉嫌违反反洗钱和反恐融资合规要求。【原文：Australia's financial crime watchdog said on Thursday it had ordered an audit of payment platform Airwallex Pty for suspected anti-money laundering and counter-terrorism financing compliance failures.】

item.title: 韩国出台里程碑式法律规范人工智能，初创企业警告合规负担沉重
item.description: 韩国周四推出其宣称的全球首套全面人工智能监管法律，旨在增强该领域的信任与安全性，但初创企业担忧合规要求可能阻碍其发展。【原文：South Korea introduced on Thursday what it says is the world's first comprehensive set of laws regulating artificial intelligence, aiming to strengthen trust and safety in the sector, but startups fretted that compliance could hold them back.】

item.title: 高盛将2026年底黄金价格预测上调至每盎司5400美元
item.description: 高盛将2026年底黄金价格预测从每盎司4900美元上调至5400美元，指出私营部门及新兴市场央行正通过黄金实现资产配置多元化。【原文：Goldman Sachs has raised its end-2026 gold price forecast to $5,400 per ounce from $4,900/oz earlier, noting private-sector and emerging market central banks' diversification into gold.】

item.title: 规模虽小但日益壮大的反对党警告日本央行加息过快
item.description: 日本央行可能正以过快速度加息，这可能损害经济，一个规模虽小但日益壮大的在野党党首如是说。该国正为下月举行的国会选举做准备。【原文：The Bank of Japan may be raising interest rates too rapidly, which could hurt the economy, the head of a small but rising opposition party said, as the country gears up for a general election next month.】

item.title: 加密货币公司BitGo在美国IPO中筹集2.128亿美元
item.description: 加密货币托管公司BitGo周三将其美国首次公开募股定价定在预期区间之上，筹集资金2.128亿美元，为2026年首家数字资产公司登陆股市铺平道路。【原文：Crypto custody firm ​BitGo priced ‌its U.S. initial public offering ‌above its indicated range ​on Wednesday, raising $212.8 ‍million and paving the way ⁠for the ‍first stock market ‌debut ‌by a digital asset company ⁠in ⁠2026.】

item.title: 特朗普放弃对格陵兰岛加征关税的威胁后，油价小幅上涨
item.description: 周四油价小幅上涨，此前美国总统在试图吞并格陵兰岛的过程中收回了加征关税的威胁，这降低了美欧贸易战的风险，并提振了全球经济和石油需求。【原文：Oil prices edged up on Thursday after the U.S. president stepped back from threats to impose tariffs in his effort to seize Greenland, reducing the risk of a U.S.–Europe trade war and supporting the global economy and oil demand.】

item.title: 澳大利亚金融业工会猛烈抨击澳新银行在Suncorp银行部门裁员
item.description: 澳大利亚金融业工会周四谴责澳新银行集团裁减Suncorp银行多个部门岗位的决定，称此次裁员违背了该集团在出售案获批时对员工作出的承诺。【原文：Australia's Finance Sector Union condemned ANZ Group's decision to cut jobs across multiple Suncorp Bank divisions on Thursday, saying the layoffs contradict the commitments it made to workers when the sale was approved.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，BitGo控股公司将其美国首次公开募股定价为每股18美元。
item.description: 据彭博社周三报道，知情人士透露，BitGo控股公司已将首次公开募股定价定为每股18美元，高于此前预告的区间。【原文：BitGo Holdings has priced its ​initial public offering at $18 per ‌share, above the marketed range, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with ‌the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普对格陵兰岛态度逆转提振美元；澳大利亚就业数据公布后澳元跳涨
item.description: 周四，美元兑主要货币延续隔夜涨势。此前美国总统特朗普撤回了对多个欧洲北约国家加征关税的威胁，并宣称已与北约就格陵兰岛控制权达成协议框架。【原文：The U.S. dollar held on to overnight gains against major peers on Thursday after President Donald Trump withdrew a threat to impose tariffs on a number of European NATO nations, trumpeting the framework of a deal with NATO over control of Greenland.】

item.title: 澳元因强劲就业数据攀升至15个月高点
item.description: 周四澳元汇率触及15个月高点，因美欧紧张局势明显缓和提振了市场风险偏好，而强劲的国内就业数据则降低了近期加息的可能性。【原文：The Australian dollar hit 15-month highs on Thursday as an apparent easing in U.S.-European tensions soothed risk sentiment, while a strong set of domestic jobs data narrowed the odds on a near-term rate hike.】

item.title: 苹果中国将对部分产品提供最高1000元的折扣
item.description: 苹果公司官网宣布，1月24日至27日期间，中国市场指定款iPhone、Mac、iPad及Apple Watch将享受最高1000元（约合143.60美元）的优惠。【原文：Apple in China will offer discounts of up to 1,000 yuan ($143.60) on designated iPhone, Mac, iPad and Apple Watches from January 24 to January 27, the company announced on its website.】

item.title: 独家：瓦莱罗收购委内瑞拉石油货运，作为华盛顿与加拉加斯协议的一部分
item.description: 据两名消息人士周三透露，瓦莱罗公司购入了一批委内瑞拉原油。这是美国墨西哥湾沿岸炼油商在华盛顿与加拉加斯达成协议后达成的首笔交易，该协议规定美国将购买最多5000万桶来自这个南美国家的原油。【原文：Valero bought a cargo of Venezuelan crude oil, two sources said on Wednesday, the first deal by a U.S. Gulf Coast refiner struck as part of Washington's deal with Caracas to buy up to 50 million barrels of the South American country's crude.】

item.title: 金价下跌，股市上涨，特朗普收回对格陵兰岛的威胁
item.description: 周四，美元走强，金价走软，股市反弹，此前美国总统唐纳德·特朗普放弃了关税威胁，并排除了以武力从盟国手中夺取格陵兰岛的可能性。【原文：The dollar was higher, gold softer and stocks on the rebound on Thursday after U.S. President Donald Trump dropped tariff threats and ruled out seizing Greenland from an ally by force.】

item.title: 澳大利亚失业率意外下降，推升加息预期
item.description: 澳大利亚12月就业数据远超预期，失业率意外降至七个月低点，促使市场缩小下月加息的可能性。【原文：Australian employment blew past forecasts in December and the jobless rate dropped unexpectedly to a seven-month low, leading markets to narrow the odds of an interest rate hike as soon as next month.】
